targets.query:
from(bucket: "polycentric")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mem")
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    contains(value: r["_field"], set: [
      "active", "available", "available_percent", "commit_limit", "cached",
      "buffered", "free", "committed_as", "dirty", "high_free",
      "write_back_tmp", "write_back", "vmalloc_used", "vmalloc_total", 
      "vmalloc_chunk", "total", "used_percent", "used", "swap_total", 
      "swap_free", "swap_cached", "sunreclaim", "inactive", "low_total", 
      "low_free", "mapped", "page_tables", "shared", "slab", "sreclaimable", 
      "huge_pages_total", "huge_page_size", "high_total", "huge_pages_free"
    ])
  )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "telegraf")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

panels.description: Lists host disks and partition metrics

targets.query:
from(bucket: "polycentric")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "disk")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "total" or r["_field"] == "used" or r["_field"] == "free")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

panels.title: Host Disk Utilization

targets.query:
from(bucket: "polycentric")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "cpu")
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "telegraf")
    |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
    |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "polycentric")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "net")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "bytes_recv" or r["_field"] == "bytes_sent" or r["_field"] == "drop_in" or r["_field"] == "drop_out" or r["_field"] == "err_out" or r["_field"] == "err_in")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "telegraf")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["interface"] == "eth0")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "polycentric")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "docker_log")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["container_name"] == "polycentric-polycentric-server-1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "telegraf")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "message")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> drop(columns:["_measurement", "_field"])

targets.rawSql: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT (system_key, system_key_type, process)) FROM events;

targets.query:
from(bucket: "polycentric")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "polycentric-server_events")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")
